title: The Officer's Wife
description: When police officer Levi Chavez finds his wife, Tera, shot to death in their home, an investigation into her murder begins as buried secrets are revealed. Josh Mankiewicz reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
